body_html:
Very strange. I have tha same issue:
.... "C:\Users\Desktop\pytorch\build\caffe2\caffe2_gpu.vcxproj" (default target) (22) ->
(CustomBuild target) ->
c:\users\desktop\pytorch\third_party\eigen\eigen\src/Core/arch/CUDA/Half.h(212): error : more than one instance of overloaded function "__hadd" matches the argument list: ....

But I have no file pytorch\third_party\eigen\Eigen\src\Core\arch\CUDA\Half.h
Where is Half.h in pytorch_ovod\third_party\eigen\Eigen\src\Core\arch\GPU, but it already has patch you've mentioned applyed. And it is in lines 274..293. Line 212 there is "namespace std {"

body:
Very strange. I have tha same issue:
.... "C:\Users<username>\Desktop\pytorch\build\caffe2\caffe2_gpu.vcxproj" (default target) (22) ->
(CustomBuild target) ->
c:\users<username>\desktop\pytorch\third_party\eigen\eigen\src/Core/arch/CUDA/Half.h(212): error : more than one instance of overloaded function "__hadd" matches the argument list:  ....

But I have no file pytorch\third_party\eigen\Eigen\src\Core\arch\CUDA\Half.h
Where is Half.h in pytorch_ovod\third_party\eigen\Eigen\src\Core\arch\GPU, but it already has patch you've mentioned applyed. And it is in lines 274..293. Line 212 there is "namespace std {"
